Uses of Class
it.sauronsoftware.cron4j.SchedulingPattern

    • Uses of SchedulingPattern in it.sauronsoftware.cron4j

      Methods in it.sauronsoftware.cron4j that return SchedulingPattern 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SchedulingPattern TaskTable.getSchedulingPattern(int index)
      Returns the scheduling pattern at the specified position.
      SchedulingPattern Scheduler.getSchedulingPattern(String id)
      This method retrieves a previously scheduled task scheduling pattern.
      Methods in it.sauronsoftware.cron4j with parameters of type SchedulingPattern 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TaskTable.add(SchedulingPattern pattern, Task task)
      Adds a task and an associated scheduling pattern to the table.
      void Scheduler.reschedule(String id, SchedulingPattern schedulingPattern)
      This method changes the scheduling pattern of a task.
      String Scheduler.schedule(SchedulingPattern schedulingPattern, Task task)
      This method schedules a task execution.
      Constructors in it.sauronsoftware.cron4j with parameters of type SchedulingPattern 
      Constructor and Description
      Predictor(SchedulingPattern schedulingPattern)
      It builds a predictor with the given scheduling pattern and the current system time as the prediction start time.
      Predictor(SchedulingPattern schedulingPattern, Date start)
      It builds a predictor with the given scheduling pattern and start time.
      Predictor(SchedulingPattern schedulingPattern, long start)
      It builds a predictor with the given scheduling pattern and start time.
